name: DaRic - Lost Explorer 2
description:
Pickup your keys, unlock those doors and find your way out to the red door in these 50 levels of puzzles. From growing vine ladders to ultimate prison traps and one way walls. Dig your way through dirt and leaves trying to solve trigger traps and avoid death holes.

You want to give your head a challenge. Here it is. No time, no lives, just try until you overcome the challenge!
